verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>

For <S%H227>then<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> shut <S%H3607>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

For <S%H834><s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had shut him <S%H3607>up,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> dost <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H3920>take<s%> it;

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> shall surely be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5414><s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

And he shall <S%H1980>lead<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall he <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H6485>visit<s%> him, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> ye <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H2601>Hanameel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> thine <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7069>Buy<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> my <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H6068>Anathoth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H1353>redemption<s%> is thine to <S%H7069>buy<s%> it.

So <S%H2601>Hanameel<s%> mine <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7704>field,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> is thine, and the <S%H1353>redemption<s%> is thine; <S%H7069>buy<s%> it for thyself. Then I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And I <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H2601>Hanameel<s%> my <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> even <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And I <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>evidence,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> it, and <S%H5749>took<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances.<s%>

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5612>evidence<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase,<s%> <S%H853>both<s%> that which was <S%H2856>sealed<s%> according to the <S%H4687>law<s%> and <S%H2706>custom,<s%> and that which was open: <S%H1540><s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5612>evidence<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4271>Maaseiah,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanameel<s%> mine <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> son, and in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> that <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase,<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison.<s%>
And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5612>evidences,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>evidence<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase,<s%> both which is <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>evidence<s%> which is <S%H1540>open;<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H5975>continue<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1004>Houses<s%> and <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> shall be <S%H7069>possessed<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now <S%H310>when<s%> I had <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5612>evidence<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Ah <S%H162><s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> by thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1697><s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> thee:

Thou <S%H6213>showest<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H7999>recompensest<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them: the <S%H1419>Great,<s%> the <S%H1368>Mighty<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%>

Great <S%H1419><s%> in <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H5950>work:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H6491>open<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men:<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his doings: <S%H4611><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> hast <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and among other <S%H120>men;<s%> and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> thee a <S%H8034>name,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>

And hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H226>signs,<s%> and with <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H248>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror;<s%>

And hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> in, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it; but they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in thy <S%H8451>law;<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> them to <S%H6213>do:<s%> therefore thou hast <S%H853>caused<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to come <S%H7122>upon<s%> them:

Behold <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H5550>mounts,<s%> they are <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> it; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and of the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and of the <S%H1698>pestilence:<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is come to <S%H1961>pass;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> it.

And <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H7069>Buy<s%> thee the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> and <S%H5749>take<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses;<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> is there <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H3920>take<s%> it:

And the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H853>on<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1406>roofs<s%> they have offered <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> me from their <S%H4480>youth:<s%> <S%H5271><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H389>only<s%> provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> to me as a <S%H5921>provocation<s%> of mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H5921>of<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they <S%H1129>built<s%> it even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> that I should <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%>

Because <S%H5921><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> <S%H1992>they,<s%> their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> their <S%H8269>princes,<s%> their <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and their <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And they have <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me the <S%H6203>back,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6440>face:<s%> though I <S%H3925>taught<s%> them, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H3925>teaching<s%> them, yet they have <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
But they <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> it.

And they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> to <S%H853>cause<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire unto <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> it <S%H5921>into<s%> my <S%H3820>mind,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> It shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%>
